questions.question: I had no difficulty registering for this course.
The course instruction was easily understood and to the point.
I learned something of value that can help me avoid future violations.
I received everything the school promised when I registered.
I was provided the correct answer and reasoning for that answer on the final exam for questions I missed.
I would recommend this school to friends and family.
There were no advertisements or unrelated material displayed or discussed during the course or final examination.
I contacted the school regarding a course question (with a “YES” answer complete 2-8; a “NO” answer continue to 6-8).
I was able to speak with an instructor.
A satisfactory answer/solution was provided within one business day.
The instructor was courteous and professional.
The school provided its name and license number when contacted.
The instructor provided his/her name and occupational license number.
I received a response to my initial course enrollment inquiry within 5 business days.
I was able to browse through the website easily.
